content: crystallographic data‡ Synthesis: The complex of 1 was synthesized by reaction of an aqueous mixture. One containing a mixture of FeSO4·(NH4)2SO4·6H2O (0.25 mmol, 98 mg) and 4-Mepy (0.5 mmol, 46.6 mg) in 50 ml water, the other contained K[AuI(CN)2] (0.25 mmol, 72 mg) 50 ml water at room temperature. The two solutions were communicated. Colorless single crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained from the mixture by crystallization in a glass tube rapidly. Elemental analysis confirmed the organic content (found: C, 25.86; H, 1.92; N, 11.29%. Calcd for C16H14N6AuFe: C, 25.97; H, 1.91; N, 11.36%.).

crystallographic data

‡ Synthesis: The complex of 1 was synthesized by reaction of an aqueous mixture. One containing a mixture of FeSO4⋅(NH4)2SO4⋅6H2O (0.25 mmol, 98 mg) and 4-Mepy (0.5 mmol, 46.6 mg) in 50 ml water, the other contained K[AuI(CN)2] (0.25 mmol, 72 mg) 50 ml water at room temperature. The two solutions were communicated. Colorless single crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained from the mixture by crystallization in a glass tube rapidly. Elemental analysis confirmed the organic content (found: C, 25.86; H, 1.92; N, 11.29%. Calcd for C16H14N6AuFe: C, 25.97; H, 1.91; N, 11.36%.).
